Title: Trust No Bitch
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Jim D. Gray, Jenji Kohan, Piper Kerman (book), Jordan Harrison (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: Miracles and conversions occur, but Piper and Caputo know that some situations can't be dealt with through spiritual means.
